title: Covid is not spoiling this New Year Eve bash
description: Increasing Covid cases in the country are unlikely to dampen large-scale New Year's Eve festivities, as there are currently no restrictions on crowd size, according to hoteliers and restaurateurs. Plans for celebrations and parties are proceeding as usual, with no numerical limits mentioned.
